alert.note: Alert for Stephenson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 10:06PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Stephenson County through 1045 PM CDT... At 1006 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Forreston to near Kirkland. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... German Valley around 1025 PM CDT. Freeport around 1030 PM CDT. Ridott around 1035 PM CDT. Dakota around 1040 PM CDT. Davis and Rock City around 1045 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Rock Grove, Winneshiek, Dakota Dornink Airport, Albertus Airport, Stephenson County Fairgrounds, Afolkey and Lake Summerset. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
